import { Component } from 'react' import "./Description.scss" import ReactTimeAgo from "react-time-ago"; import axios from "axios"; const apiURL = 'https://project-2-api.herokuapp.com' const apiKEY = '?api_key=67e1a87f-213f-4fba-b06e-69697646e796' export default function Description(props) { return (

{this.props.videoDetails.title}

{`By ${this.props.videoDetails.channel}`} {} {}
{this.props.videoDetails.views}
{this.props.videoDetails.likes}

{this.props.videoDetails.description}

); }
